mapper.select: SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, UPLOAD_IMG, ROUND(VOTE_COUNT / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE AUTHOR = 'OWNER') * 100, 1) PERCENT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN VOTE_START AND VOTE_END THEN '진행중' WHEN SYSDATE < VOTE_START THEN '진행예정' ELSE '투표마감' END AS OVER FROM VOTE ORDER BY (CASE OVER WHEN '진행예정' THEN 1 WHEN '진행중' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END), VOTE_END DESC

SELECT V.VOTE_NO, V.VOTE_TITLE, V.VOTE_START, V.VOTE_END, V.VOTE_DAY, VC.VC_QUES_NO, VC.VC_CONTENT FROM VOTE V, VOTE_CONTENTS VC WHERE V.VOTE_NO = VC.VOTE_NO AND V.VOTE_NO = #{voteNo} ORDER BY 1 DESC, 6

SELECT V.VOTE_NO, V.VOTE_TITLE, V.VOTE_START, V.VOTE_END, V.VOTE_DAY, HVC.HV_STATUS FROM VOTE V JOIN HOUSE_VOTEINFO HVC ON V.VOTE_NO = HVC.VOTE_NO WHERE V.VOTE_NO = #{voteNo} AND HVC.HOUSE_INFO = #{houseInfo}
SELECT V.VOTE_NO, V.VOTE_TITLE, V.VOTE_START, V.VOTE_END, V.VOTE_DAY, SYSDATE - V.VOTE_END FROM VOTE V WHERE V.VOTE_NO = #{voteNo}

SELECT A.*, ( SELECT VC_CONTENT FROM VOTE_CONTENTS B WHERE A.HV_RESULT = B.VC_QUES_NO AND A.VOTE_NO = B.VOTE_NO) VC_CONTENT FROM (SELECT VOTE_NO, HV_RESULT, COUNT(*) MAX_COUNT FROM HOUSE_VOTEINFO WHERE VOTE_NO = (select VOTE_NO FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_END = (SELECT MAX(VOTE_END) FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_END < SYSDATE)) GROUP BY VOTE_NO, HV_RESULT ORDER BY MAX_COUNT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_END = (SELECT MAX(VOTE_END) FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_END < SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_END BETWEEN SYSDATE-1 AND SYSDATE+2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE ( VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_DAY, UPLOAD_IMG ) VALUES ( VOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{voteTitle}, #{voteStart}, #{voteEnd} + 1, #{voteEnd} + 3, #{uploadImg} )

SELECT VOTE_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO VOTE_CONTENTS ( VC_NO, VOTE_NO, VC_CONTENT, VC_QUES_NO ) VALUES ( VC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{voteNo}, #{vcContent}, #{vcQuesNo} )
INSERT INTO HOUSE_VOTEINFO VALUES ( HV_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{voteNo}, #{houseInfo}, 'Y', #{hvResult}, SYSDATE )
